dimensions.name: Development Progress
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Run 'git log'. Check for >10 commits and narrative progression. Use AST to verify: 1. State reducers (operator.add), 2. Parallel fan-out in engine.py, 3. Hardcoded rules in chief_justice.py. Flag 'bulk upload' if timestamps are clustered.
dimensions.statute: Prosecutor: Charge 'Orchestration Fraud' and cap at 7pts if flow is linear or commits are monolithic.

dimensions.name: Feedback Implementation
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Locate 'audit/report_bypeer_received/'. Cross-reference identified gaps in that report with subsequent git commit messages. Verify if structural changes (not just cosmetic) were made after the feedback date.
dimensions.statute: Defense: Argue for 20pts if commits show comprehension and traceable fixes of peer-flagged issues.

dimensions.name: Proactive Communication
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Scan PDF report for mentions of: 'Blockers', 'Design Decisions', 'Coordination', and 'Feedback Engagement'. Look for evidence of a bidirectional loop rather than a one-time handoff.
dimensions.statute: Tech Lead: Score 20 only if the report demonstrates architectural trade-offs discussed during development.

dimensions.name: Agent Feedback Relevance
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Evaluate the output in 'audit/report_onpeer_generated/'. Does it follow AuditReport Pydantic spec? Does it contain AST-based code verification and multi-perspective judge opinions with citations?
dimensions.statute: Chief Justice: deterministic check. If report is missing or contains hallucinated paths, score 0-5.

synthesis_rules.logic_over_vibe: Technical Lead carries 40% weight on DEV_PROGRESS; Defense carries 40% on FEEDBACK_LOOP.
